summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Fire Department; accepting an offer of financial assistance from the King County Department of Emergency Medical Services for training of Seattle Fire Department personnel as Emergency Medical Technicians, Increasing Object of Expenditure "1000 - Personal Services" in Program Category "Training" (Code 2200) in the 1975 Budget of the Fire Department, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund, and declaring the emergency therefor.
